oracle.kubernetes.operator

Class ServiceWatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.kubernetes.operator.ServiceWatcher

  • public class ServiceWatcher
extends Object
    This class handles Service watching. It receives service change events and sends them into the operator for processing.

    • Method Summary

      • initiateWatch

        public WatchI<io.kubernetes.client.models.V1Service> initiateWatch(WatchBuilder watchBuilder)
                                                            throws io.kubernetes.client.ApiException
        Initiates a watch by using the watch builder to request any updates for the specified watcher
        Parameters:
        watchBuilder - the watch builder, initialized with the current resource version.
        Returns:
        Watch object or null if the operation should end
        Throws:
        io.kubernetes.client.ApiException - if there is an API error.
